title: Peter combe plays chopsticks: and other collectable clips for kids
creator_credit: ABC-TV (Australia), Trish Foremen and Catherine Shirley
brief_description: This compilation of favourite Peter Combe songs is guaranteed to have kids singing and dancing. Peter’s famous “Chopsticks” song is included as well as “Saturday night”, “Wriggle and roll”, “Newspaper Mama”, “Music of the day”, “Spaghetti bolognaise”, “Toffee apple”, “Happy Christmas to you” and “Jack and the Beanstalk”, along with the two poems “Newspaper Mama visits the Queen” and “Very strange cat.”
